Headline: #49 Western Temporary Reroute at Western/Harrison

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Northbound Reroute near Austin/Augusta
ShortDescription: Northbound 91 Austin  buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Chicago, Central, Division and Austin: due to, fire department activity near Austin/Augusta.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #91 Austin  buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Chicago, Central, Division and Austin: due to, fire department activity near Austin/Augusta.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
